contact.title: Tell us about your event
contact.subtitle: The more we know, the better we can help make your day perfect

eventDate.label: Approximate date
eventDate.help: Don't worry if you're not sure yet – we can work with flexible dates!

message.label: Tell us about your vision
message.placeholder: Share your ideas, venue, number of guests, special moments you want captured, or anything else that would help us understand your event better...

privacy.line1: We don't share your info. We'll only reach out to help with your event.
privacy.line2: No spam, no pressure – just great photography and videography when you're ready.

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Thanks for reaching out! We'll get back to you within 24 hours with all the details about making your event amazing.

response.title: Quick Response
response.description: We typically respond within 24 hours with a personalized quote

commitment.title: No Commitment
commitment.description: Getting a quote is completely free with no strings attached

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: We never share your information and only contact you about your event

button.desktop: What event are you thinking about?

eventType.title: What event are you thinking about?
eventType.subtitle: Tell us what you want to celebrate

date.title: Do you have a date already?
date.subtitle: Don't worry if you're not sure yet
date.noDate: I don't have a date set yet

contact.title: Want to tell us more?
contact.subtitle: Choose how you prefer us to contact you

moreInfo.title: Yes, I want to tell you more details
moreInfo.subtitle: We take you to the complete form

callMe.title: I want you to call me
callMe.subtitle: We prefer to talk by phone

phone.title: Perfect! We call you
phone.subtitle: Leave us your number and we contact you soon

complete.title: Ready!
complete.message: We will contact you very soon to talk about your event.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a passionate team dedicated to capturing the most important moments of your life with excellence, warmth and agility.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe that every event is unique and deserves to be documented with maximum dedication. Our approach is not just to capture images, but to tell stories that endure over time. We combine professional technique with artistic sensitivity to create memories that move and transcend generations.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: We study every detail of the event to anticipate key moments.

coverage.title: Comprehensive Coverage
coverage.description: Our team is strategically distributed to not miss any moment.

capture.title: Professional Capture
capture.description: We use advanced techniques and state-of-the-art equipment.

postproduction.title: Post-Production
postproduction.description: We carefully edit every image and video to achieve exceptional results.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We love what we do and it shows in every image we capture.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Our collaborative model allows us to cover every important moment.

quality.title: Technical Quality
quality.description: We use professional equipment and advanced techniques for exceptional results.

agility.title: Agility
agility.description: We adapt quickly to any situation to never miss a moment.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, exceeding expectations.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We build lasting relationships based on transparency and professionalism.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email so we can get back to you
